chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Dear team,
my package was supposed to be delivered, but according to UPS I wasn't available. This is not the case, though. I was at home on Friday, May 17th, during the given time frame by UPS. Despite this, the delivery did not arrive.
The package will probably be sent back to you now. How does it proceed then?

Best regards,
Lucie Trützschler

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

There are delivery problems and the customer cannot reach UPS. Can you please contact UPS and ask for delivery to a nearby pick-up point?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have informed our logistics partner of this request and will keep you posted.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner informed us that the parcel would be delivered to the following relay point:

MOAREPAIR , 79 TURMSTRASSE , BERLIN , 10551 , Germany

Please inform the customer to pick up the parcel.

Regards,
Xt
